author: gstein
msg: More SWIG work to get repos to build/link properly.
* bindings/swig/svn_types.i (OUT_PARAM_S): add a cast since SWIG has
some issues with dropping a 'const' in the arg declaration. we need
to cast to get the type matching up properly.
(MAKE_PLAIN_TYPE): new macro. variant of MAKE_TYPE to create types
without an indirection on them (e.g. the ptr is built into the
argument to NULL since it is possible to never fill in the
value. (avoids a compiler "possibly not set" warning).
* bindings/swig/svn_repos.i: include typemaps.i so that we get some
for now, ignore svn_repos_get_logs since we don't really know where
MAKE_PLAIN_TYPE_IMPL_NO_DECL): new macros for forcing types into

author: gstein
msg: More stringbuf elimination. This time, concentrating on libsvn_repos.
delete_path vtable functions to take 'const char *' rather than
repos_path and fs_path members to 'const svn_string_t *'
* libsvn_ra_local/commit_editor.c: update for session baton changes
* libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c: update callers and session baton users
base_path member to 'const char *'. change users.
(svn_repos_finish_report): update some calls and base_path usage.
(svn_repos_begin_report): change some params to 'const char *'. copy
the params into our pool to be independent of the callers.
(delta_proplists, delta_files, delta_dirs): change path args to

msg: minor tweak. lose the svn_wc.h header (not needed)

author: striker
msg: Update documentation to reflect the recent updates to

author: rooneg
msg: When copying a file from the repository to the working copy, preserve
any properties the file had set on it.  This fixes most of issue #591.
(get_file): add a 'props' argument, which holds a pointer to an
apr_hash_t * that will contain the properties of the file retrieved.
(get_file): add the propls argument.  if props is non-null, fill it
with the properties that are set on the file.
(repos_to_wc_copy): when copying a file, pass a props hash to
get_file, and apply the properties to the new copy.
(get_file_from_ra): catch up to change in get_file by just passing
(svn_ra_dav__get_file): if the caller passed in a props hash, fill
it in with the properties of the file.
